- Exterior wall: stucco finish over masonry; location: around the window on the first-floor wall.
- Window: white vinyl frame, appears to be a double-hung/sliding unit with screen; location: centered in the stucco opening.
- Surface condition: paint/siding above window is peeling and cracking; location: horizontal siding above the window.
- Sealant: caulking around the window perimeters appears cracked/missing at some jambs; location: left/right sides and bottom of the frame.
- Cracks: hairline stucco cracks near the window opening (sill/left edge); location: around the window.
- Maintenance recommendations: re-caulk perimeter, reseal and repaint surrounding siding, monitor for moisture intrusion.
